channel.title: Help with custom weps/items
channel.description:
so i decided to try and add some custom weapons to my server. but wen i got around to adding the int's to the class8 i added them, and when i try and start my client it stops loading at 'loading config' and i cant even log in to see if it worked. i have all the models and stuff in the right place my client just wont let me in. anyone got any idas :confused:
P.S FIRST POST! :D

item.title: Help with custom weps/items
item.dc:creator: @shamushay shamushay
item.description:

so i decided to try and add some custom weapons to my server.
but wen i got around to adding the int’s to the class8 i added them, and when i try and start my client it stops loading at ‘loading config’ and i cant even log in to see if it worked.
i have all the models and stuff in the right place my client just wont let me in.
anyone got any idas
